seo.title: Coaching services
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching pathways designed for relocation, return-to-work clarity, and UK workplace confidence.

hero.title: Coaching pathways shaped with you
hero.subtitle: Each pathway is a starting point. We adapt pace, language, and focus once we understand your reality.

pathways.title: Choose a pathway
pathways.description: Four pathways clients ask for most often. Each one flexes to match your context.

cards.title: Transition coaching
cards.target: For relocations, returns, and role changes.
cards.scenario: You want a steady partner while reshaping work, place, and support systems in the UK.
topics: Map the realities of visas, finances, care, and capacity before leaping.
Design decisions that honour both new possibilities and current limits.
Experiment with CVs, conversations, or trial roles without burning out.

cards.title: Early-career coaching
cards.scenario: You want space to test options and name what matters without pretending you “have it together.”
topics: Translate family, financial, and personal expectations into doable steps.
Hold space for doubt while you build language for what you want.
Prototype side projects, conversations, or moves safely before deciding.

cards.title: Working parent coaching
cards.target: For parents and caregivers rebuilding rhythms.
cards.scenario: You need breathing room to juggle care, work, and identity without stretching beyond capacity.
topics: Surface invisible labour and design boundaries you can actually hold.
Negotiate support at work and home without guilt-driven decisions.
Create sustainable self-care that fits into the week, not the wishlist.

cards.title: Leadership coaching
cards.target: For managers in complex, cross-cultural roles.
cards.scenario: You want a reflective partner while you lead across borders, expectations, and power lines.
topics: Ground decisions in role clarity so you stop carrying what is not yours.
Design high-stakes conversations with cultural nuance and integrity.
Sustain your leadership without overwork as proof of value.

cta.title: Not sure where to start?
cta.body: A 20-minute intro chat lets us hear your context and shape the right mix together.

seo.title: Transition coaching for relocation, return and role change | SustainSage
seo.description: Navigate UK relocation, return-to-work plans, and role changes with a calm, structured coaching partner.

hero.title: Transition coaching for relocation, return and role change
hero.subtitle: A steady, structured space to navigate UK moves, career shifts and returns to work without burning out.
hero.primaryCta: Explore if this fits your transition

items.summary: Relocating to the UK with mixed pressures.
items.detail: You feel pulled between “take anything quickly” and “hold out for the right fit.”
You paused work for caregiving, study or health and want to re-enter in a way that honours your limits.
You are moving into something new and do not want to repeat old burnout patterns.
People keep offering tips; you want one place to think clearly and decide what is yours.
We bring questions, structure and reflection while you choose focus each time.
We consider visa, finances, caring duties, language, health and networks before planning moves.
We name what is non-negotiable for you right now and where you have agency.
We test CV stories, outreach, or trial roles that match your current capacity.

steps.detail: 責任、壓力來源、支援、內在雜訊—我們把真實狀況放在檯面上。
針對當下的限制與資源，找出 2–3 個可行方向。
一頁 CV、LinkedIn 調整、兩個安全對話、時程測試。

steps.summary: Session 4 · Reviewing what the experiments showed.
steps.detail: 辨識順手與卡住之處，判斷阻力來自恐懼、資訊還是結構。
時間、家庭協調、自我照顧與外部資源配合。
釐清接下來三個月要做／不做什麼，以及壓力來時怎麼重整。

items.detail: A story they can use in CVs, interviews, or networking that feels 真實而不自賣.
1–3 viable directions rather than 10 abstract possibilities.
A “small steps without over-pushing” rhythm they can sustain.

items.summary: Signals for when to seek other support.
items.detail: Clearer judgement on when legal, financial, or therapeutic resources are needed.
We do not offer immigration, legal, tax or clinical advice.
If therapy, legal or financial advice is appropriate we will say so clearly.
Confidentiality with clear limits, respect for your choices, no hidden agenda.

items.question: Can we talk about visas or immigration rules?
items.answer: We can explore how rules impact your options, but we do not replace qualified legal advice. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: What if I do not complete the “homework”?
items.answer: We talk about what got in the way. Your pace is data, not a failure. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: Is this only for big moves?
items.answer: No. It is for any transition where you want a calmer, more intentional way through. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

cta.title: Ready to talk through your transition?
cta.body: If you are unsure, the intro chat stays focused on your reality and whether this support fits.
cta.primaryCta: Explore if this fits your transition

seo.title: Early-career coaching for “I’m not sure yet” | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore options, build confidence, and make grounded decisions without pretending to have everything figured out.

hero.title: Early-career coaching for “I’m not sure yet”
hero.subtitle: Space to test options, build confidence and make decisions without pretending to “have it all figured out”.

items.detail: You are 20–35, working or job-hunting, 常常覺得「我是不是走錯行？」。

items.summary: Balancing expectations and your own values.
items.detail: You feel torn between 家人期待、薪水、安全感和自己在乎的事。

items.summary: Tired of passion vs practicality debates.
items.detail: 你被「要有熱情」和「要務實」兩邊拉扯，很累。
你不想被填鴨指導，只想有人陪你把「現實可行的小步驟」想清楚。

items.summary: No checklists of what you “should” do.
items.detail: We stay curious and keep you in the driver’s seat.

items.summary: Slow down to hear your own voice.
items.detail: We separate what is yours from what社群媒體 keeps shouting.

items.summary: Gather data about skills, limits and curiosity.
items.detail: We整理你的技能、限制、好奇，找出可以被測試的方向。

items.summary: Connect every session to real next steps.
items.detail: 每次談話都連回你下一步可以實際嘗試什麼，而不是只講道理。

steps.detail: 工作 / 求職現況、壓力來自哪裡、你已經試過什麼。

steps.summary: Session 2 · Growing language for what matters.
steps.detail: 說得出「我在乎什麼」而不是只說「不要什麼」。
side project、資訊訪談、短期課程、內部轉調探索。

steps.summary: Session 4 · Reading the data, not just emotions.
steps.detail: 哪些實驗有火花？哪些只是別人說好？
與家人、主管、同儕的期待談判，而不是硬撐。

steps.summary: Session 6 · Planning the next season (if needed).
steps.detail: 必要時整理 3–6 個月行動＋回頭檢視的方法。

items.detail: 更誠實的自我敘事：可以對父母 / 朋友說得出口又不羞愧。
一份真正可行的短期行動清單，而不是空洞的「追隨熱情」。
對「迷惘本來就正常」的健康理解，少一點自責。
不做診斷、不貼病名。
若有明顯情緒困擾／創傷議題，會鼓勵且協助你尋找合適心理專業。
完全以你為主，不會替你決定方向或推銷特定產業。

items.question: I do not have a clear goal. Can I still come?
items.answer: Yes. That is usually where we start. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: Will this feel like being lectured?
items.answer: 不會。我們一起設計方式，你保有決定權。 If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: Can I book one session at a time?
items.answer: 可以，但多數人會選 3–6 次做比較完整的整理. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

cta.title: Ready to try a small step?
cta.body: Bring the questions that feel messy. We will map options and see what is realistic together.

seo.title: Coaching for working parents and caregivers | SustainSage
seo.description: Rebuild rhythm, boundaries and identity while balancing work and care without pretending you have endless capacity.

hero.title: Coaching for working parents and caregivers
hero.subtitle: Support to rebuild rhythm, boundaries and identity without pretending you have endless capacity.

items.detail: 你在育兒、長照與工作之間拉扯，覺得「不管怎麼選都對不起誰」。
回到職場後狀態還沒穩定，就被期待「回到以前的你」。

items.summary: Your needs keep moving to the bottom.
items.detail: 想為自己保留一點空間，但每次都排在最後。
想要一個不批判你的空間，幫你看清楚實際限制和可以談的餘地。

items.summary: Start with your day, not theory.
items.detail: 我們從「你的一天」開始，看到真實節奏。
一起盤點可用 / 不可用的時間、支援、制度、內疚感。
找出可談判的空間（工作安排、家務分工、自我期待）。
用教練提問協助你做選擇，而不是教你當完美父母。

steps.detail: 現在的負荷全圖：工作、家務、情緒勞動，全部攤開。
辨識真正優先順序：根據價值觀，而不是罪惡感。
設計小調整：會議時間、請求支援、分工實驗。
處理內在聲音：失敗感、比較、要求做「超人」的文化。
建立可維持的節奏：每週 1–2 個你守得住的界線。
檢視與調整：什麼有效？哪些需要更多支持或外部資源？

items.detail: 具體可以執行的界線，例如不再回所有非急訊息、明確下班時間。
和伴侶或家人的新對話方式，而不是悶著撐。
比較可持續的自我照顧，而不是偶爾爆買或爆睡。
不批判教養選擇、不強迫某種價值。
不代替你做家庭決策，但幫你把思路整理清楚。
若有明顯產後憂鬱／心理健康風險，會建議尋找專業協助，而非自己撐過去。

items.question: 我時間很亂，真的排得出教練？
items.answer: 可以一起討論最小可行安排；如果現在真的排不出，我們也會誠實說. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: 配偶 / 家人可以一起參與嗎？
items.answer: 可視情況協調，但主體仍是你的目標. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: 會不會被說「你要求太多」？
items.answer: 不會。我們討論現實與選擇，而不是評價你. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

cta.title: Ready to protect space for you?
cta.body: Let us map what is non-negotiable and where support can grow.

seo.title: Leadership coaching for complex, cross-cultural roles | SustainSage
seo.description: Partner with an ICF-aligned coach to navigate new scope, cross-border expectations, and cultural nuances without losing yourself.

hero.title: Leadership coaching for complex, cross-cultural roles
hero.subtitle: A reflective partner for managers and professionals navigating new scope, cultures and expectations.

items.summary: Stepping into bigger or cross-border roles.
items.detail: You are leading in the UK or across countries with little formal support.
在團隊與高層之間卡位：想好好對人，但也得交出結果。
搬到或管理英國／多國團隊，文化溝通讓你覺得說什麼都不對。

items.summary: Looking for partnership, not “霸氣領導學”.
items.detail: 你不要模板式的權威技巧，只要一個能和你一起思考的人。
以實際會議、衝突、決策為起點，而不是抽象理論。
幫你看「角色 vs 自我」：哪些是職務要扛的，哪些不是。
探索你自己的領導風格，在文化差異中仍保有一致。
對齊 ICF 精神：你是專家，我是思考拍檔，不替你管人。

steps.detail: 情境盤點：組織、團隊、人際權力線。
定義你要成為哪種領導者：可被實踐的，而不是海報標語。
關鍵對話設計：棘手回饋、一對一、一對多。
決策與界線：什麼要說「不」、如何說。
跨文化敏感度：在 UK / 多國團隊中實際可行的調整。
長期維持：如何繼續反思，而不需要永遠依賴教練。

items.detail: 更穩定的一致作法：團隊知道你的原則是什麼。
幾個實際被解開的難題（但歸功於你自己行動，我只是幫你對焦）。
對壓力的更清晰界線，不再用過勞來證明價值。
不參與內部政治、不替你對特定員工診斷標籤。
不做心理治療；如有需要會建議尋找合適資源。
嚴格保密你的職場案例，在合法與風險界線內。

items.question: Can my company sponsor this?
items.answer: 可以。我們會事先釐清三方關係與保密邊界. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: How is this different from mentoring or consulting?
items.answer: 我們不給標準答案，而是幫你思考、試、調整屬於你的做法. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

items.question: Is this suitable for a single session or longer work?
items.answer: 重大轉職 / 新職通常 6–9 次最有幫助，也可以先從 3 次開始. If this brings up questions, you can mention it in the intro call form.

cta.title: Want a reflective partner in your context?
cta.body: Bring the decisions or conversations on your desk and we will make space to think them through.
